      • version

        private java.lang.String version

      • dbConnection

      • path

      • BufferCompression

        private java.lang.String BufferCompression
        String used to select the compression method to be used by BufferFileModule. Defaults to NONE if element is not provided. Used value is parsed and stored in Dynamic. See the file parsing code in Dynamic for accepted values. FIXME add to user documentation

      • TestQuerySizeLimit

        private int TestQuerySizeLimit
        This is the size limit for test runs. Value here is from XML, unchecked. FIXME : add to user documentation

      • skipCSVFullChecksums

        private boolean skipCSVFullChecksums
        When true, tells the CSV manager to not perform checksum of whole files; Currently unsafe, useful for tests and very large files.
